comment: His expectations are clear and he lets you know what to study for tests. Class is not hard. If you can't pass his class, then you can only blame yourself. Tests aren't too difficult. He doesn't spoon feed you the material, but he'll answer all your questions thoroughly. Would 100% take any class he teaches. Lab is easy, show ALL calcs on lab report

RUSSEL IS A GOOD TEACHER! PRACTICE HIS PROBLEMS THAT ARE WORKED IN CLASS AND MAKE SURE YOU ASK QUESTIONS HE WILL SHOW YOU ANYTHING IF YOU DONT UNDERSTAND! DOESNT GIVE MUCH HOMEWORK BUT WHEN HE DOES HE WILL GO OVER IT ! IN LAB HE EXPLAINS EVERYTHING HE DOES GRADE HARD ON LABS SO MAKE SURE YOU FOLLOW HIS FORMAT BUT IN ALL HE'S A GOOD PROFESSOR
Take Russel! Cool guy who knows his material. Sometimes will just issue test and leave the class.

Nice guy. Very helpful inside and outside of class. He explains how and why everything works and lets you use cheat sheets on tests. He also goes over all the homework in detail. If you cant pass his class you can blame your self.
Amazing teacher!  If you don't learn the material you can only blame yourself.  He works very hard with students to make sure they comprehend his lessons.
THE GOD OF THERMODYNAMICS!!! GOOD TEACHER
One of a dying breed when it comes to engineering professors.  You will never get as much practical knowledge out of a professor.
Great ol school engineering prof. Worked industry and knows fluid dynamics inside out. Relates it alot to industry and what you can expect. Labs were moderate
Excellent professor. Knows his material. Fair tests and grading. Very clear and helpful. Excellent lab instructor.
